text: (arthaat) ek rasool jo tumhen allaah kee spasht aayaten padhakar sunaata hai, taaki vah un logon ko, jo eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe karm kie, andheron se nikaalakar prakaash kee or le aae. jo koee allaah par eemaan lae aur achchha karm kare, use vah aise baagî€¼on mein daakhil karega jinake neeche naharen bah rahee hogee - aise log unamen sadaiv rahenge - allaah ne unake lie uttam rozee rakhee hai
